name: Lands of Akslop
description:
Lands of Akslop is a strategy game, where your goal is to conquer all cities or to conquer the castle. You can have buildings to produce valuable items for your country. You need to decide how to organize army, because enemies can conquer your cities and buildings.

Battle is turn-based, where you simply have to beat the opponent where every unit has different statistics.

Controls

W A S D - movement.
Mouse wheel - Zoom/UnZoom.
Left mouse button - Move object.
Right mouse button - Select object.
Spacebar - Tactical mode.
Esc - Pause Menu.

Installation
  1. Download game
  2. Unzip it
  3. Play!

Please let me know if you liked it or not. Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. Thank you!
